==== declFileTypeAnnotationParenType.ts (3 errors) ====
    class c {
        private p: string;
                ~
!!! error TS2564: Property 'p' has no initializer and is not definitely assigned in the constructor.
    }
    
    var x: (() => c)[] = [() => new c()];
    var y = [() => new c()];
